MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​REPL.​ReplInterpreter
public
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​REPL.​ReplHistoryInterpreter

An implementation of ReplInterpreter which supports a very basic history of recent input lines.

Evaluate
public override DynValue Evaluate(
string input
)

Evaluate a REPL command.  This method returns the result of the computation, or null if more input is needed for having valid code.  In case of errors, exceptions are propagated to the caller.

Parameter
input
string

The input.

Returns

This method returns the result of the computation, or null if more input is needed for a computation.
